title: FS: 1906 Lancaster Red Roses Postcard with T206 Players
author: Tripp Trapp

posts.post_title: FS: 1906 Lancaster Red Roses Postcard with T206 Players
posts.post_content:
Net54 community,

For sale I have a very nice SGC graded 1906 Lancaster Red Roses postcard. It features several T206 players, including Barger, Chappelle, Dougherty, Downey, Durham, Lennox, etc.

SOLD
